entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
